[none]
# Enable for 64bit systems like rpi2 rev 2
arm_64bit=1

[pi3]
# Necessary pi 3 and pi 3+ configurations to get uart like on before
dtoverlay=pi3-disable-bt
# Enable for 64bit systems like rpi2 rev 2 or rpi3
arm_64bit=1

[pi0]
# Necessary pi zero and pi zero w configurations to get uart like before
dtoverlay=pi3-disable-bt

[all]
# uart init
init_uart_baud=115200
init_uart_clock=3000000

# set kernel to load ( commented out due to correct build )
# kernel=kernel7.img

# disable device tree to use atags if wanted
device_tree=

# Set gpu memory
gpu_mem_256=64
gpu_mem_512=64
gpu_mem_1024=64
